title: 25 of the Grooviest Hippie Halloween Costume and Accessory Ideas Out There
text: It's officially time to plan your halloween costume. If you're going the hippie route, you've come to the right place. We found totally affordable (and groovy) hippie Halloween costume ideas for men and women. We also rounded up some amazing individual fashion pieces that can add boho flair to your wardrobe before, during, and after October 31st. You can even use them to create your own homemade costume, which, to be honest, would be so 1960s of you! Scroll through to see the very best in dresses, bell bottoms, tie dye, peace signs, and more.
